divs: sighting detailssighting report: daate: 04\07\2005 time: 8:40 p.m. location: buckingham county, virgina 2 miles south of buckingham baptist chuch on u.s. 15 north. description: large octagonal shaped object (50 yard diameter approx.)flew over our car and over the highway 100-150 altitude as we traveled north. the object had an octagonal outline that could be seen due to the large counter-clockwise pulsing lights that could be seen looking up at bottom of craft. there also was an intense white light that came from the crafts underside that shined toward the ground. the object made no noise whatsoever. green and yellow lights with slow counter-clockwise rotation underneath craft. weather: 1\4 mile visibility with light rain. other observations: cell phone interupted momentarily. i looked in the rear view mirror and it was gone. there were no street lights, cell phone towers or house lights observed anywhere in the immediate vicinity.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Free Union
This sighting has never been favorited.
